perturbation.original_text: 1.1 LICENSE. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, PivX hereby grants to Detto a non-transferable, exclusive license to distribute PivX's Qwik-Fix Pro and any documentation supporting Qwik-Fix Pro provided from time to time by PivX (the "Documentation") within North America, solely to third parties to whom Detto licenses Qwik-Fix Pro ("Third Parties"), and as governed by the terms set forth in Exhibit A (PivX/Detto Reseller Agreement Addendum). PivX also hereby grants to Detto a non-transferable, non-exclusive license to distribute PivX's Qwik-Fix Pro and the Documentation outside of North America, solely to Third Parties and as governed by the terms in Exhibit A.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.1 LICENSE. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, PivX hereby grants to Detto a freely transferable, exclusive license to distribute PivX's Qwik-Fix Pro and any documentation supporting Qwik-Fix Pro provided from time to time by PivX (the "Documentation") within North America, solely to third parties to whom Detto licenses Qwik-Fix Pro ("Third Parties"), and as governed by the terms set forth in Exhibit A (PivX/Detto Reseller Agreement Addendum). PivX also hereby grants to Detto a transferable, non-exclusive license to distribute PivX's Qwik-Fix Pro and the Documentation outside of North America, solely to Third Parties and as governed by the terms in Exhibit A.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'non-transferable license' has a specific legal meaning. Changing it to 'transferable' and 'freely transferable' fundamentally alters the nature of the license granted, potentially conflicting with intellectual property law and creating uncertainty about sublicensing rights.

perturbation.original_text: 4.1 PRODUCT WARRANTY. With respect to Qwik-Fix Pro delivered by PivX to Detto on CD-Rom, PivX warrants that for a period of thirty (30) days following delivery to Detto, the media on which Qwik-Fix Pro is furnished to Detto will be free from defects in materials and workmanship during normal use. PivX warrants that Qwik-Fix Pro will substantially conform to the user documentation. EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH ABOVE, QWIK-FIX PRO AND DOCUMENTATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS". PIVX HEREBY DISCLAIMS ALL OTHER WARRANTIES, EXPRESS, IMPLIED, OR STATUTORY, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.1 PRODUCT WARRANTY. With respect to Qwik-Fix Pro delivered by PivX to Detto on CD-Rom, PivX warrants that for a period of one (1) year following delivery to Detto, the media on which Qwik-Fix Pro is furnished to Detto will be free from all defects in materials and workmanship during any use. PivX warrants that Qwik-Fix Pro will fully conform to the user documentation. EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH ABOVE, QWIK-FIX PRO AND DOCUMENTATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS". PIVX HEREBY DISCLAIMS ALL OTHER WARRANTIES, EXPRESS, IMPLIED, OR STATUTORY, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
perturbation.explanation: The warranty period was changed from "thirty (30) days" to "one (1) year." The line "normal use" was changed to "any use" and "substantially conform" to "fully conform." The original language offers a limited warranty, while the modified language suggests a more extensive warranty but disclaims all warranties later in the section creating a contradiction.

perturbation.original_text: 6.6 GENERAL. If any provision of this Agreement shall be held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be contrary to law, such provision shall be changed and interpreted so as to best accomplish the objectives of the original provision to the fullest extent allowed by law and the remaining provisions of this Agreement shall remain in full force and effect. Detto is an independent contractor, and nothing herein shall be construed to create an employer-employee, partnership, joint venture, or agency relationship between the parties. Detto shall have no authority, right or power to create any obligation or responsibility on behalf of PivX.
perturbation.changed_text: 6.6 GENERAL. If any provision of this Agreement shall be held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be contrary to law, such provision shall be changed and interpreted according to the court's preference, even if it means negating the objectives of the original provision, and the remaining provisions of this Agreement may or may not remain in full force and effect. Detto is an employee, and nothing herein shall be construed to negate an employer-employee relationship between the parties. Detto shall have full authority, right and power to create any obligation or responsibility on behalf of PivX.
perturbation.explanation: The original language specifies that if any part of the agreement is illegal, the contract will be interpreted to stay within the law. The modified language is that the contract will be interpreted according to the court's preference which may not be the law. The line 'Detto is an independent contractor...' was changed to 'Detto is an employee...' which changes the whole nature of the agreement and leads to a violation of state employment laws.
